name: Flying Deadly Dragon Simulator
description:
Devbatch Studio presents this Warrior Flying Deadly Dragon War 3D Game for Action lovers. Fly your warrior dragon like a dragon slayer or a knight. You have to control this deadly creature in a highly trained manner. This warrior dragon target the fire balls on enemies location. Track down your enemies building using bird eye view and destroy them before time passed. This epic war game theme based on Medieval Age when dragon really exists in this planet. Don’t harm innocent people just spot our enemy bases. Win all the missions in this dragon VS human battle.

Warrior Flying Deadly Dragon War 3D is a free action game with realistic war and 3D Medieval theme. Navigate your dragon with navigation joystick and takeoff and land by right slider. Just spot out the instructed locations and tap on it to fire the deadly fire balls. You have to keep it mind all mission are time restricted.


FEATURES:
- Absolutely Free
- Realistic 3D War and Medieval HD environment
- Unique Fire Ball Animation, Attack animation, Take off animation, Fly animation and much more
- Challenging Levels based on time and complexity
- Realistic hurdles, trees and huts
- Bird eye view and smooth game play
- Variety of deadly dragons
- Realistic war theme
- Many fulfilled 3D missions and chapters
- Full Action packed music and sound effects
- Realistic Controls
- Easy to play
- No Internet required
- No In-App Purchases
and many more
